name: Blue Cheese Mousse
author: LittlemanKeagan
summary: Blue cheese mousse is a great cracker topper or vegetable dip. Use a pastry bag with a round tip and pipe onto your favorite cracker. You can top with favorite vegetables sliced thin.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Puree blue cheese and cream cheese together in a food processor until completely smooth; transfer to a bowl and season with kosher salt and black pepper
Beat heavy cream in a glass or metal bowl until soft peaks form
Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the whipped cream will form soft mounds rather than a sharp peak
Fold whipped cream into the blue cheese mixture, stirring until the mixture is creamy with no lumps
Transfer mixture to a pastry bag with a round tip for piping
